text: Boris Borisovich Kokorev (, 20 April 1959 – 22 October 2018) was a Russian competitive pistol shooter. He won a gold medal in the Men's 50 Metre event at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, Georgia. He was born in Tbilisi. Kokorev died in Moscow on 22 October 2018 at the age of 59.Олимпийский чемпион по пулевой стрельбе Кокорев скончался на 60-м году жизни ==References== ==Other websites== * Boris Kokorev at Sports-Reference Category:1959 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Russia Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Sport shooters
title: Boris Kokorev
